La Casa de Toño is a great spot for a big crew, or when you just need to eat various combos of meat, cheese, and tortillas.ORDER THE: pozole. That alone should be enough to fill you up, but why stop there when there are flautas, enchiladas, quesadillas, and tostadas calling your name...THE VIBE IS: bustling. Expect gatherings of all sizes of families and friends. And a crazy efficient waitstaff that might even clear your plate before you've had the last bite.PRACTICAL STUFF: There are several locations of La Casa de Toño and not all of them are 24-hours.
